amendment.description: To repeal the expansion of information reporting requirements for payments of $600 or more to corporations, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 9 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Motion to waive all budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 9 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 81 - 17. Record Vote Number: 8.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 9.

Amendment SA 9 proposed by Senator Stabenow. (consideration: CR S382; text: CR S382) To repeal the expansion of information reporting requirements for payments of $600 or more to corporations, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 9 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 81 - 17. Record Vote Number: 8.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 9 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 9 proposed by Senator Stabenow.
